Name: Umbraco file upload with progress bar

Content.summary: 'Umbraco file upload with progress bar' - a blog post by Darren Ferguson about Human Interest written on 23 May 2006
Content.bodyText:
I have created an Umbraco datatype that enhances the standard upload type, so that you get a progress bar and cancel button.

Download it here

Iâ€™d very much appreciate it if any of you running dev Umbraco instances would road test this for me and let me know of any bugs, issues, feature requests.

Note: This control streams the file to a temporary folder during upload rather than storing the whole post request in memory.
